string.value: What the Blue King Goblin Wants
The Guardian Spirit says the Goblins of Kamak Mountain are the only ones that know something about the Old Fox. Go see the #bBlue King Goblin#k at #bDokebi House#k near the Haunted House.

The Blue King Goblin says he will tell everything about the Old Fox only if I get him #b1 bottle#k of his favorite #brice wine#k. Let's go buy rice wine from the Folk Town. \n\n#i2022052##t2022052# #b#c2022052##k/1
The Blue King Goblin revealed where the Old Fox appears.
어흠어흠. 도깨비 감투를 어디 뒀더라아? 맨날 까먹는단 말이야! 점점 더 건망증이 심해지나봐! 아참! 저번에 잔치에 가서 잃어버렸었지? 또 까먹었네! 감투를 훔쳐간 인간놈을 혼내줬었잖아! ...그런데 찾아온 감투는 어디다 뒀더라아?
으음? 넌 인간이잖아? 왜 인간이 이런 곳에 있는 거지? 감투를훔쳐갈 생각이라면 절대 안 될걸? 이미 어디다 놨는지 잊어버렸거든. ...어흠어흠! 뭐? 구미호에 대해 알려달라고? 헤에~ 이상한 인간이네. 구미호에 대해 정말 알고 싶어?
그럼 곡차를 1개 구해줘! 쌀을 발효시켜서 만든 시큼하고 달짝지근한 맛있는 곡차를 한 개 주면 구미호에 대해 말해주지!
몰라도 상관 없다는 거야? 하긴 너도 건망증이 심하면 몰라도 상관 없겠지. 어차피 까먹을 테니까!

Ahem, ahem. Where have I put my Goblin cap? I always forget! My memory is getting shorter and shorter everyday! Oh! I lost it at the feast before, haven't I? I've forgotten about the feast! Then I scolded the bad human who stole my cap! And... brought my cap back, but where did I put it?

Huh? Aren't you human? What are you doing here? If you're here to steal my cap, then you're out of luck, because I already forgot where I put it. Ahem, ahem! What? You need to know about the #rOld Fox#k? Oh~ you are a strange human, aren't you? Do you really want to know about the Old Fox?
Then get me #b1 bottle#k of #brice wine#k! Rice wine is a rather sweet beverage made by fermenting rice. One bottle to trade for information on the Old Fox!
What?! Not interested? Oh well. If you have poor memory like me, you would forget about it anyway!
Ahem, ahem. Brought the rice wine with you? Let's see~ Hmm, this smell! It's made by the best rice wine brewer, Kongji from the Folk Town! I love it! You've earned your piece of information.

The Old Fox appears around Kamak Mountain, particularly near the #bMoon Hill#k! You can go there by passing through the deep valley from the Fox Ridge. Many Samihoes gather there to absorb moonlight to get strength. I recommend not going there if you value your life!
You haven't brought #ba bottle#k of #brice wine#k yet? No rice wine, no Old Fox information!
